task.title: How to Run a Zoom Meeting
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will find instructions about running a Zoom meeting.

taskbody.prereq: The desktop app, which offers the best experience, is available for Windows and macOS. Make sure the app is set up in your computer. You can join a meeting without signing in or signing in using a Zoom account, Google, Facebook , or SSO.

step.cmd: Click on the New Meeting dropdown menu.
Scroll down and click on your ID number. Choose the Copy Invitation option.
Share the invitation with the participants to the meeting, then hit the New Meeting icon to start the meeting.
Once in the meeting, click on Join with Computer Audio to enable your microphone.

taskbody.result: You have created and started a new meeting.
